other_tests.findings: Absence of the paternal allele at 15q11-q13 due to abnormal methylation, suggesting a defect in imprinting.

other_tests.date: Every 6 months, initial MRI not dated
other_tests.findings: Enlarged liver with diffuse fat infiltration and multiple numerous focal lesions suggestive of multiple adenomas (adenomatosis).
other_tests.changes_over_time: No significant interval changes in the number or size of the adenomas.

other_tests.date: Initial ultrasound not dated, follow-up in 2021
other_tests.findings: Multiple lesions initially thought to be areas of focal fatty sparing; follow-up showed a markedly echogenic and heterogeneous liver.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The largest adenoma measured 13 mm superficially in the left lobe (previously up to 11 mm), with others generally around 6 mm in diameter.
